comment: This has some alcohol heat, but nothing that overpowers the bourbon.  This bottling comes in at 59.73% alcohol.  The flavor has sweet caramel notes, butterscotch, brown sugar, baking spice, slight club soda and oak. This is a nice bourbon.

Barrel # 441. Batch # 15

Honey, toffee, maple and vanilla on the nose. Palette of toffee, caramel, cornbread and baking spice. Medium sweet finish.

So incredibly floral! A very nice unique experience. 

Overall a 90.
